name: Crop Drop (heho)
description:
Intro

One morning you wake up and realize to your surprise that you have become a farmer. Maybe you were before, but that doesn't matter now. The important thing is that you are standing in front of a farm and you are completely unaware of how to operate it. So you do what any responsible food producer does and read the farm's instruction manual. 

Here you quickly learn that the proper use of the farm is relatively simple, at least the first of the hundreds of pages seem quite clear: you plant stuff like this, and then you harvest it. Some of the stuff grows better when planted next to other stuff.

So far so good. Now try to grow as much grain as possible and don't let the aliens steal your cows.

The Game

This game is about planting and harvesting crops.

To win a level you need to reach the goal written at the top.

To plant crops or play an effect select a card on the right. Crops come as tiles. You need to find an empty slot on your field for them (red means it does not fit here).

Click to drop the crops onto your field. Rotate a tile by pressing the right mouse button or using the buttons on the bottom of the screen

Crops on the field become harvested whenever a row or column is full. Each harvested crop will give you one dollar.

You will get bonus points for

  •  Wheat - The more wheat is in a row the more bonus points you get
  • Apples & Pears - Apples and pears generate extra points when they are adjacent to each other
Effects
  • Watering Pot: Crop on selected field will spread to free neighboring fields.
  • Spade: Remove crops on all fields covered by the tile.
